projects: [{"title":"Improving the Performance of Intelligent Lower Limb Prosthesis","start_date":"Jul 2011","end_date":"Apr 2012","description":"Conceptualized an innovative idea to improve the performance of existing high-end intelligent prosthesis- Increased input sensitivity and improved weight balance in the prosthesis- Coordinated prosthesis and normal limb using the gait pattern- Achieved dynamic updating of the gait database according to individualâ€™s gait cycle to customize prosthesis- Successfully used magnetic particle brakes for knee-locking to reduce weight and improve efficiency"},{"title":"Development of a Deep Drain Cleaning Mechanism","start_date":"Jan 2010","end_date":"Apr 2010","description":"- Conceptualized a deep drain cleaner for the aid of workers of Municipal Corporation of Delhi- Designed and simulated a model of the product on Solidworks- Applied design practises such as DFM and DFA to realize budget, weight and reliability requirements- Product was displayed at I2 Tech Open House 2010 and received comments from visitors as being one of the most useful and application-oriented products"}]

honors_and_awards.title: Winners
honors_and_awards.description: Participated in EXL Excellence Quotient 2011 (A PAN IIT Consulting Case Contest) - Helped retail banking division of a hypothetical bank in increasing the PPC (product per customer) ratio from 2 to 3 when the industry average was 2.5 - Designed a campaign for the small business division to increase market share annually by 10% - Won a smartphone and a placement offer from EXL Service

honors_and_awards.title: Certificate of Merit- The Green Olympiad
honors_and_awards.publication: Ministry of Environment and Forests, Government of India
honors_and_awards.description: Awarded Certificate of Merit by the Ministry of Environment and Forests, Government of India for excellent performance in GREEN Olympiad 2004
